entries.sigma\_effect: Σ distributes over conjunction to separate NOT(A) and NOT(B).
Σ distributes over disjunction for NOT(A), NOT(B).

entries.theta\_effect: Θ\_IMP(A,B) and Θ\_OR(¬A,B) share the same Θ⁺ / Θ⁻ partition.
entries.sigma\_effect: Σ\_IMP(A,B) is computed via Σ\_OR(Σ\_NOT(A), Σ\_B).

entries.expression: FORALL x A(x) ≡ NOT(EXISTS x NOT A(x))
entries.theta\_effect: Global Θ⁺ for FORALL corresponds to absence of Θ⁺ witness for NOT A under EXISTS.
entries.sigma\_effect: Σ\_FORALL \= inf over Σ\_A; Σ\_EXISTS \= sup over Σ\_A.
entries.pi\_constraint: Π\_FORALL(x,A) \= 1 iff there is no x s.t. Π\_A(x) \= 0.

entries.sigma\_effect: Σ□ uses inf over worlds; Σ◇ uses sup.
